    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;

}

}

    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;

    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;

    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {

}

<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Chiang Mai Sightseeing Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/thailand-tour-packages" title="Thailand Tour Packages">Thailand</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Chiang Mai Sightseeing Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c33eba5c1a4_22299522" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/chiang-rai-sightseeing.jpg" alt="Chiang Mai Sightseeing Tour Package" title="Chiang Mai Sightseeing Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Chiang Mai, one of the most beautiful destinations in Thailand boasts a plethora of tourist attractions and increases the rate of Thailand tourism to a great extent. After considering this point we have designed this 2 Nights and 3 Days long Chiang Mai Sightseeing Tour Package. Grab this most customized tour package and get the opportunity to travel across the amazing places located in the different regions of the city. You will get the chance to witness the lifestyle of tribal community living in the tribal village at Doi Pui and also show your bargaining skills in the city and bring some souvenirs to home.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Chiang Mai Sightseeing Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Bangkok and Sightseeing Tour of Chiang Mai</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Welcome to Thailand! On your arrival at the airport, our representative will meet and greet you and then will transfer you to the pre-decided hotel. This beautiful and the most important temple in Chiang Mai is tucked on a hill from where one can overlook the entire city. After visiting this temple, go for the sightseeing tour of the central area of the city which is believed to be almost 700 years old. Enjoy the scrumptious lunch at the restaurant and continue driving towards the handicraft village which is located on the Sankampaeng Road. The village is pretty popular for making adorable handicraft items including, wood carving, Thai Silk, Silver Ware, and gems stone. After exploring this beautiful village return to the hotel for dinner and overnight halt.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Full Day Sightseeing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Give a perfect start to your day with the hearty breakfast served at the hotel. Post breakfast, get ready to explore the wonders of the city and Maesa Elephant Camp comes first in the list. Enjoy the sight of elephants taking a bath in the Mae Sa River and then participate in the elephant show organized at 9:45 in the morning and continues for almost 1 hour. Feed something to the baby elephants and click some pictures as a memory of this visit. Spend your lunchtime at the Orchid and the Butterfly farm and then if you wish then proceed towards the Tiger Kingdom and click some pictures with the tigers to add more memories of your tour. Continue driving towards the tribal village and on reaching there you will see 5 different groups of hill tribes having Karen long neck.</p>
<p>Stroll down the village area and then drive back to the hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Half Day Sightseeing Tour and Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Start your day little early today and after Savoring the scrumptious morning meal, drive towards Doi Inthanon National Park which is believed to be the highest mountain peak of Thailand. You will also be visiting the gorgeous the astounding twin pagodas which are adorned with panoramic scenery. At last, make your visit to the Karen Village which is pretty popular for its cultural heritage in the country. You will be dropped back to the hotel to take your luggage along with you as this is the time to board your flight for your onward journey towards home.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
